$800: (Sarah of the Clue Crew reports from Mont St. Michel, France.) Mont St. 
Michel's most dramatic natural feature is the arrival of the tide; this French 
romantic novelist described it as "coming in as swiftly as a galloping horse"

question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew reports from Mont St. Michel, France.)  Mont St. Michel's most dramatic natural feature is the arrival of the tide; this French romantic novelist described it as "coming in as swiftly as a galloping horse"
